name: ticket-booking
description: A ticket booking website created for the circus group Arctic Ensemble. Made with React.

scripts.install: cd shared && npm i && cd ../backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.prod: npm i --omit=dev && npm run build && npm start
scripts.deploy: npm run fetch && npm run prod
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint && cd ../shared && npm run lint

author: Veikka Pulsa
